text: Tomara ki mane karo ye tomadera chere deya habe, athaca allah jene nena ni ye tomadera madhyera kara sangrama karache, ara kara allahâ€Œke chere diye ba tamra rasulake bada diye ba muminadera byatita kono antaranga bandhu grahana kare ni? Ara tomara ya karo allah se-sanbandhe purna-oyakiphahala.
